# privx_carrier (Resource)

Carrier resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "privx_carrier" "example" {
  name            = "mycarrier"
  access_group_id = "33304b0b-e62e-44ef-b78f-26bb5e0edc88"
  subnets = [
    "0.0.0.0/0"
  ]
  enabled = true
  extender_address = [
    "0.0.0.0/0",
  ]
  web_proxy_address                 = "0.0.0.0"
  routing_prefix                    = "carrier"
  web_proxy_extender_route_patterns = ["route_pattern"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Carrier name
- `web_proxy_address` (String) Web Proxy address

### Optional

- `access_group_id` (String)
- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `extender_address` (Set of String) Extender addresses
- `group_id` (String) Group ID
- `routing_prefix` (String) Routing Prefix
- `subnets` (Set of String) Subnets
- `type` (String)
- `web_proxy_extender_route_patterns` (Set of String) Web Proxy Extender Route Patterns
- `web_proxy_port` (Number) Web Proxy address

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Carrier ID
- `permissions` (List of String) Carrier permissions
- `registered` (Boolean) Carrier registered
